title: What are the examples of scientific ideas that were proposed then rejected by the original scientist but are now accepted by science? - Quora

response.answer_text: Heritability of acquired traits. When I was in school all generalizations of Lamarckism were laughed at. This week, I learned that we have since found several mechanism for limited heritability of acquired traits.

The expanding universe was what Einsteins calculations produced, because there was no evidence for an expanding universe he assumed he was wrong and added an adjustment factor. Shortly after Hubble observed the red-shift of light from stars indicating space was expanding. Einstein declared that adjustment factor was his greatest mistake.

Prof ChanDraSEkhar of India’s paper on black holes were given least respect when at a very young age he submitted, but his theory was accepted very much latter in his old age! He got Nobel prize and the limit when the stars turn black holes have been named ‘ ChanDraDEkhar limit.
